portfolio.title: MIF Business Website
portfolio.description: Developed a business website for MIF, showcasing their services and offerings. The website includes a responsive design and seamless user experience.

portfolio.title: MIF LMS
portfolio.description: Built a Learning Management System (LMS) for MIF, enabling students to access courses, assignments, and track their progress.

portfolio.description: Developed an Attendance Management System for MIF, allowing teachers and administrators to track student attendance efficiently.

portfolio.title: BonanzaCloset eCommerce Store
portfolio.description: Created an eCommerce platform for BonanzaCloset, featuring a smooth shopping experience, product catalog, and secure payment system.

portfolio.title: Full-stack Blog App for FAST
portfolio.description: Built a full-stack blog application for FAST students, featuring a user-friendly interface, dynamic content creation, and real-time updates.

testimonial.description: Hamza's work on our business website has been exceptional. The website's design is not only visually appealing but also highly functional and user-friendly. He has consistently delivered beyond our expectations.

Hamza's development of the BonanzaCloset eCommerce platform was a game-changer for our business. The seamless shopping experience, robust backend, and secure payment system have truly elevated our brand presence online.
